text: Nawan Pind Halt railway station (, ) is located in Sheikhupura District, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Sheikhupura District Category:Railway stations on Shahdara Bagh–Sangla Hill Branch Line
title: Nawan Pind Halt railway station
